column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The Chicago classic deep dish was to die for. It had the perfect ratio of ultra gooey cheese to meat ratio. And I love that the sausage wasn't little pieces strewn randomly about...it was a 1/4" sausage patty enveloping the entire pie. That's LOVE. And all of this is housed within a thick (but not too thick) butter crust. I could eat this for days on end probably...ugh
column2: so good. The thin crust pizza was kind of joke though...didn't expect too much from it
column3: but also didn't expect what seemed to be a cheese cracker
